import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import "./navbar.css"; function Nav() { const [navbar, setNavbar] = useState(false); const changeBackground = () => { if (window.scrollY >= window.screen.height / 25) { setNavbar(true); document.getElementById("logo").setAttribute("style", "background: url('../images/gcf_logo_clear.png');"); } else { setNavbar(false); } }; window.addEventListener("scroll", changeBackground); return (
